text: The Acura CSX is a Subcompact luxury car made by Acura, a brand of Honda, from 2005 to 2011. It replaced the Acura EL. == History and Features == The Acura CSX was launched in 2005 as a 2006 model. It is based on the eight-gen Honda Civic having the same chassis. The car has a different styling from the Honda counterpart and shares the same engine which is a 2.0 liter gasoline engine with a 5-speed manual and automatic transmissions. A sportier version called the CSX Type-S was debuted in 2007. The CSX Type-S has the same powertrain of the Honda Civic Si sold in The United States and Canada which is also a 2.0 liter petrol engine and a 6-speed manual transmission. The version alongside the standard CSX were both facelifted in 2009. == Markets == The Acura CSX was sold only in Canada during its production-run. == Discontinuation == The Acura CSX was discontinued in 2011 but it was the best-selling car in the Canadian lineup of Acura.Acura aims to revive its image -- The Globe and Mail (Retrieved 2012-01-23) The car was later replaced by the Acura ILX.Acura retools lineup to put the focus on mpg -- Autoweek (Retrieved 2011-12-12) == References == Category:Acura automobiles Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles
title: Acura CSX
